name: Roger The Rat
description:
Roger The Rat was made in Scratch 2.0 and is available to play on the Scratch Website

Goal

Roger must collect all pieces of cheese from the 21 levels. Roger must do this while avoiding getting killed by the various enemies in the 4 worlds his adventure takes him through. 

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move

Use the mouse to navigate menus

Credits

The art for Roger was inspired by this image

The music was downloaded on playonloop

The sound effects were found on various websites and are all available for free for the public to use

Everything else was made by me (Pixel art, programming, gamedesign, animation, etc)
